title: Wide Angle Seated Forward Bend
description: Sit with your legs stretched in front of you. Open your feet as wide as possible. Point your toes up. Walk your arms forward with an exhale. Grasp your big toes with your index fingers. Breathe here for a moment. Bend forward from your hips with an exhale and hold the outsides of your feet. Relax your neck. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Point toes and knees toward sky Lengthen front of torso Avoid rounding the spine Modification: Stay upright and walk hands forward as much as possible without straining.
